## IAxisMap interface

Maps the columns in a dataframe to axis in the chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAxisMap 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [x?](./chart-def.iaxismap.x.md) | [IAxisSeriesConfig](./chart-def.iaxisseriesconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The default x axis for the chart. |
|  [y](./chart-def.iaxismap.y.md) | [IYAxisSeriesConfig](./chart-def.iyaxisseriesconfig.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The y axis for the chart. |
|  [y2](./chart-def.iaxismap.y2.md) | [IYAxisSeriesConfig](./chart-def.iyaxisseriesconfig.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The optional second y axis for the chart. |
